name: A Simple Mistake
description:
STORY
It is a cold wintery night. You are driving on the deserted road towards the familiar hills of Westlake Creek and it isn’t far until you will be home.

But then…BANG and a sound of grinding metal! A sudden jolt and you notice smoke is pouring from the hood of your car. You need to call for help.

You look around and notice a large mansion house down a gated path. Lights are on so someone must be home. You are thankfully not alone out here.

You decide to see if whoever lives there can help. But have you just made a simple mistake?

GAMEPLAY
Explore an ancient old building. A home to an elaborate architect that has a passion for puzzles and secret passageways.

Make your way through the house room by room trying to make that all elusive telephone call.

What secrets will you discover, will you ever manage to make that telephone call and escape?

FEATURES
= Amazing visuals
= Captivating soundscapes
= Brain teasing puzzles
= Hidden pathways
= Bountiful inventory items and combinations

BACKGROUND
From the creator of Mystery of Camp Enigma. If you are a fan of point and click, hidden object, mystery, adventure or escape rooms then you will love playing A Simple Mistake

A Simple Mistake is the vision of a solo developer. I am always fascinated by your feedback, which is turn gives me the inspiration for the next adventure!

Please continue to share your thoughts and feedback in all the usual ways.

NOTES
Please note that saving is automatic as each room or level is completed.
